text:
HN Who is Hiring

    ==============
         Lyft 
    ==============
Lyft is hiring:

  * Engineering Manager 
  * Robotics Software Engineer (Autonomous) 
  * Backend Software Engineer 
  * iOS Software Engineer (Senior only)
  * Android Software Engineer (Senior only)
  * Frontend Web Engineer 
  * Data Analyst 
  * Data Scientist
We have offices in:

  * San Francisco 
  * Seattle 
  * New York City
Please also look at our jobs page at lyft.com/jobs for more positions

I can submit your resume and refer you if you're interested. Send an email to me@azimi.me
